name: iPhone 12 Pro
description: The iPhone 12 Pro and iPhone 12 Pro Max are smartphones designed, developed, and marketed by Apple Inc.

name: Samsung Galaxy S21
description: The Samsung Galaxy S21 is a series of Android-based smartphones designed, developed, marketed, and manufactured by Samsung Electronics as part of its Galaxy.

name: Sony PlayStation 5
description: The PlayStation 5 (PS5) is a home video game console developed by Sony Interactive Entertainment.

name: Xbox Series X
description: The Xbox Series X and Series S are the fourth generation of the Xbox series of home video game consoles developed and sold by Microsoft.

name: Nike Air Max 90
description: Nike Air Max is a line of shoes produced by Nike, Inc., with the first model released in 1987.

name: Adidas Stan Smith
description: Adidas Stan Smith is a tennis shoe made by Adidas, and first launched in 1965.

name: Apple AirPods Pro
description: AirPods Pro are wireless Bluetooth in-ear headphones designed by Apple, initially released on October 30, 2019.

name: Dell XPS 13
description: Dell XPS is a line of consumer-oriented high-end laptop and desktop computers manufactured by Dell.

name: HP Pavilion 15
description: HP Pavilion is a line of consumer-oriented laptop and desktop computers produced by HP Inc.

name: Sony WH-1000XM4
description: The WH-1000XM4 are closed-back headphones with a single 40mm dynamic driver on either side

name: Logitech G502
description: The logitech g502 is a mouse that was released by logitech in the year 2014. It features a free spinning wheel as well as the PWM3366 sensor.

name: Razer BlackWidow Elite
description: Razer BlackWidow is a range of mechanical gaming keyboards made by Razer.

name: Levis 501 Jeans
description: Levi Strauss & Co is an American clothing company known worldwide for its Levi's brand of denim jeans.

name: Ray-Ban Wayfarer Sunglasses
description: Ray-Ban Wayfarer sunglasses have been manufactured by Ray-Ban since 1952, which in turn has belonged to the Italian Luxottica Group since 1999.

name: Canon EOS Rebel T7i
description: The Canon EOS 800D, known in the Americas as the EOS Rebel T7i and in Japan as the EOS Kiss X9i, is a digital single-lens reflex camera announced by Canon.

name: Nintendo Switch
description: The Nintendo Switch is a hybrid video game console developed by Nintendo and released worldwide in most regions on March 3, 2017.

name: Vans Old Skool
description: Vans is an American manufacturer of skateboarding shoes and related apparel, established in Anaheim, California, and owned by VF Corporation.

name: Apple Watch Series 6
description: Apple Watch is a line of smartwatches produced by Apple Inc. It incorporates fitness tracking, health-oriented capabilities, and wireless telecommunication.

name: GoPro Hero 9
description: The GoPro HERO (2014) can capture 5mp still images and has a 5fps burst option. It is able to record 1080P at 30 or 25fps and 720P at 60 or 50fps.

name: Bose QuietComfort 35 II
description: The QuietComfort Earbuds (QC Earbuds) were released on 5 October 2020.

name: The Beauty of Darkness: The Remnant Chronicles, Book Three
description: The third and final book in the New York Times-bestselling Remnant Chronicles.

name: Disney Junior Mickey Mouse
description: Join Mickey Mouse on a mixed-up adventure with the Disney Junior Mickey Mouse Beanbag Plush.

name: Pro Kitchen Knife
description: High-Carbon Stainless Steel Blade- It is manufactured from high-quality stainless steel that maintains its functionality for a long time.

name: Outdoor Basketballs
description: Street ball will never die. Built for summer tournaments and Saturdays at the park, the Spalding Street outdoor basketball holds to the official size and weight.

name: Versace Bright Crystal
description: An enthralling and voluptuous fragrance, eloquent, symbolizing the Versace woman who is strong and sure of her charm; sensual and feminine, always glamorous
